quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Wise Living Technology Co., Ltd - H Shares
quote.nm: Wise Living Technology Co., Ltd - H Shares
quote.summary: Wise Living Technology Co Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the heat supply and related services. The Company’s main businesses include heat services, heat-related engineering construction services, heat-related energy-conservation service contract (EMC) services. The Company’s heat services mainly include provision and distribution of heat and pipeline connection services. The Company is also engaged in the sale of heat service facilities (including heat service equipment, devices and relevant parts), the provision of design services, which mainly consist of indoor heat operation designing and consulting services and the provision of heat transmission services. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market.
